oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lila Scott Buchanan portrait photograph
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Copy of a black and white phototograph of Lila Scott Buchanan as a young woman. Lila Herrin Scott married James M. Buchanan, Sr. in 1918. Their son, economist James McGill Buchanan Jr., was born the following year.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buchanan family
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: May be freely reproduced. Please provide proper attribution of digital image;
